content: Psalm 29[a]
A psalm of David.
acknowledge the ’s majesty and power.
Acknowledge the majesty of the ’s reputation.
Worship the  in holy attire.
The ’s shout is heard over the water;
the majestic God thunders,
the  appears over the surging water.
The ’s shout is powerful,
the ’s shout is majestic.
The ’s shout breaks the cedars,
the  shatters the cedars of Lebanon.
He makes them skip like a calf,
Lebanon and Sirion like a young ox.
The ’s shout strikes with flaming fire.
The ’s shout shakes the wilderness,
the  shakes the wilderness of Kadesh.
The ’s shout bends the large trees
and strips the leaves from the forests.
Everyone in his temple says, “Majestic!”
The  sits enthroned over the engulfing waters,
the  sits enthroned as the eternal king.
The  gives his people strength;
the  grants his people security.
